name: R5-CommunicationRequest-R4-CommunicationRequest
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 CommunicationRequest into FHIR R4

element.display: A request for information to be sent to a receiver

target.display: A request for information to be sent to a receiver
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest`

element.display: Resources that pertain to this communication request

target.display: Resources that pertain to this communication request
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.about` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.about`

element.display: When request transitioned to being actionable

target.display: When request transitioned to being actionable
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.authoredOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.authoredOn`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.basedOn`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.category`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.contained`

element.display: True if request is prohibiting action

target.display: True if request is prohibiting action
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.doNotPerform` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.doNotPerform`

element.display: The Encounter during which this CommunicationRequest was created

target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.encounter`

R5 `CommunicationRequest.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `CommunicationRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Composite request this is part of

target.display: Composite request this is part of
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.groupIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.groupIdentifier`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.id`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.implicitRules`

element.display: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `CommunicationRequest.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `CommunicationRequest.medium` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.medium`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.meta`

R5 `CommunicationRequest.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `CommunicationRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `CommunicationRequest.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `CommunicationRequest.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.occurrence[x]`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.payload` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.payload`

R5 `CommunicationRequest.payload.content[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `CommunicationRequest.payload.content[x]` - content[x] has change due to type change: R5 `content[x]` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `content[x]`; content[x] has change due to type change: R5 content[x] CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 content[x]

R5 `CommunicationRequest.payload.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `CommunicationRequest.payload.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.payload.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.payload.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.payload.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `CommunicationRequest.payload.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `CommunicationRequest.priority` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Who to share the information with

target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.recipient` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `CommunicationRequest.recipient` - recipient has change due to type change: R5 `recipient` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `recipient`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.replaces` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.replaces`

element.display: Who asks for the information to be shared

target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.requester` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.requester`

element.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

target.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `CommunicationRequest.statusReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.statusReason`
R5 `CommunicationRequest.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `CommunicationRequest.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `CommunicationRequest.text`
